pt2ir_t Class Reference

Detailed Description

pt2ir_t is a class that can convert PT raw trace to DynamoRIO's IR.

Member Function Documentation

◆ convert() [1/2]

pt2ir_convert_status_t pt2ir_t::convert ( IN const uint8_t *  pt_data,
IN size_t  pt_data_size,
INOUT drir_t &  drir 
)

The convert function performs two processes: (1) decode the PT raw trace into libipt's IR format pt_insn; (2) convert pt_insn into the DynamoRIO's IR format instr_t and append it to ilist inside the drir object.

Parameters
pt_dataThe PT raw trace.
pt_data_sizeThe size of PT raw trace.
drirThe drir object.
Returns
pt2ir_convert_status_t. If the convertion is successful, the function returns PT2IR_CONV_SUCCESS. Otherwise, the function returns the corresponding error code.

◆ convert() [2/2]

pt2ir_convert_status_t pt2ir_t::convert ( IN const uint8_t *  pt_data,
IN size_t  pt_data_size,
INOUT drir_t &  drir 
)

The convert function performs two processes: (1) decode the PT raw trace into libipt's IR format pt_insn; (2) convert pt_insn into the DynamoRIO's IR format instr_t and append it to ilist inside the drir object.

Parameters
pt_dataThe PT raw trace.
pt_data_sizeThe size of PT raw trace.
drirThe drir object.
Returns
pt2ir_convert_status_t. If the convertion is successful, the function returns PT2IR_CONV_SUCCESS. Otherwise, the function returns the corresponding error code.

◆ init() [1/2]

bool pt2ir_t::init ( IN pt2ir_config_t &  pt2ir_config,
IN struct pt_image_section_cache *  shared_iscache 
)

Initialize the PT instruction decoder and the sideband session.

Parameters
pt2ir_configThe configuration of PT raw trace.
shared_iscacheThe shared image section cache.
Note
The pt2ir_t instance is designed to work with a single thread, while the image is shared among all threads. Therefore, a shared image section cache must be provided.
Returns
true if the instance is successfully initialized.
